The Catholic Church must change some of its views. Many people are leaving the Church. The Church is not accepting of many things.

For example, the Church is against gay marriage, abortion, and birth control. These are important issues. The Church's views are old. The Church should be more modern.

People disagree with the Church on these issues. They think the Church is wrong.  People who support abortion or gay marriage may not feel welcome in the Church.  

The Church does not allow female priests. It also says priests must not marry.  

Why can't priests marry? They have a job, and everyone else has a family. Priests should be able to have both.

I support gay marriage. I think people are born this way.  It is not a choice. Gay people should not be punished for who they are.  A man and a woman can marry. Two people of the same sex should be able to marry too.

I do not think the government should be involved. It is a personal choice. It is not a crime. It is not a moral issue. The government should not tell people who they can marry. 

It is wrong to say gay people made a wrong choice.

Gay marriage is good. There is not a good reason to say no. Some people think gay couples are bad for families. But gay couples are different. They are like two sides of the same thing.

Gay couples have the same rights as straight couples. They should have the same rights for health care and taxes.

If a gay couple is sick, their partner cannot be in the room. This is wrong.

Science shows that gay couples are happy. They have the same things that make a relationship strong. 

Gay couples want a marriage certificate, not a church wedding. The government should give them this.

Some people say that gay marriage is wrong because of religion. But the government should not make laws based on religion.

Gay marriage is like segregation. It is not fair.

Some people worry about gay couples having children. They think children of gay couples will have problems. But gay couples can be good parents.

Gay people should not be treated badly. The government should make gay marriage legal in all states.

I work in a hospital pharmacy. I see drugs every day. Some drugs are bad. But some drugs help people.  

Some drugs are against the law. But that does not mean they are bad. Some drugs are good for people.

For example, we use some strong drugs in the pharmacy. These drugs are against the law. But they help people feel better.  

Marijuana is against the law. But it can help people.  We should look at the good things about marijuana.  

Alcohol is bad if you use too much. Marijuana can also be bad if you use too much. But we should not say marijuana is bad because it is against the law.

We should learn about marijuana. We should talk about it openly. 

Marijuana is not as bad as other drugs.  We should not think of marijuana as a bad thing.

The church is different now than it was many years ago. It is not as strict. When I was young, I went to church every Sunday. I wore a dress, shoes, and a purse. I went to a private school and saw my friends there every weekend. Now, the church has a special service for teenagers. It is thirty minutes long. People dress more casually. In the summer, people come in beach clothes. Families often arrive late. Even at morning services, people wear jeans and khakis.

People say that letting women be priests would stop bad things from happening. But bad things happen even to married men. I think it is a person's choice to become a priest. There are other religions where priests can be married. If someone wants to be married and religious, they should choose a different religion.

I think some people are born with bad thoughts. It is like their genes. Marriage does not change this. It might be hard to hide, but it might happen anyway. The church cannot stop this from happening. If the church knew about these bad things and covered them up, that is wrong. But I do not think they always knew.

I did not like the idea of war in Iraq. Many people felt the same way after the September 11th attacks. The Bush administration said the war was about stopping Osama Bin Laden and stopping Saddam Hussein from hurting America. They said Hussein had weapons of mass destruction. This is not true. It made me angry. 

The Bush administration did not tell the truth to the people. Colin Powell, who spoke at the United Nations, now says he was not sure about the evidence. This is wrong. It is bad for a leader to lie to the people. I think it is a serious problem.

The Bush administration did not respect the Constitution. They wanted to go to war. The Secretary of the Treasury said this in a book. He left his job. I think President Bush wanted to fight Saddam Hussein because his father had trouble with him. I also think he wanted more oil.

The war has gone on for a long time. It is hard to leave now because Iraq might have a civil war. More people would die. 

The United Nations and the United States want other countries to help. They want to help make peace. But this might cause more problems. Iraq needs to be in control of its own country. 

The Iraqi government is not working well. The Parliament is not strong. The Prime Minister does not have much power. There are many groups fighting for control. The situation is very difficult.

I talk about the war in Iraq. 

I think it is bad. 

We went to war in Iraq after the bad men hurt America on nine eleven.  

But now I think it is not good.

We stay in Iraq to help them. We want them to have good government like America.

But it is hard. We stay in Iraq for a long time.

It is bad for the people in Iraq.

It is bad for America.

I do not know what to do.

I do not think it is right to make this act legal. I do not think a state should say it is legal. I think it is up to the churches. The constitution says there should be a separation of church and state. This is clear.  Trying to make a law about this would go against the constitution.

People who want to make this act illegal are choosing one church's beliefs over others. Many Catholics and Christians are against this. I do not think the government should say what churches can and cannot do.

Separation of church and state is important for religious freedom in the United States. Making a new law about this would be wrong. It would go against the constitution. It would also be one of the few laws that restrict people, not the government. I do not think this is right.

I do not think the government should be involved in this issue. The person pushing for a new law is doing this because he does not agree with this act. He is choosing his religion over others. I think it is up to the churches to decide. The government should not tell them what to do. There is no good reason to make a new law.

The war in Iraq is bad. The government did not tell the people the true reasons for the war. They tried to say the war was needed after the attacks on September 11th. But these two things were not connected. The government used the people's fear to start the war in 2003. 

I am against war, especially starting a war before it is needed. The war in Iraq is like the war in Vietnam. The government should have learned from past mistakes. Many American soldiers died. The government took over Iraq's government. They did not plan for what would happen after. The government did not plan for the problems and chaos that followed.

The United States is trying to make Iraq a democracy. This is like what they tried to do in Vietnam. They wanted to stop Communism.  But the government should have known that it would be very hard. It would not be a quick victory. 

In Vietnam, there were many people who did not want the United States there. It is hard to fight a war against your own people. You cannot win this kind of war. 

The government should have been more honest and ready for the war. They did not plan for what would happen after they removed the Iraqi government. We are still there today, and many American soldiers are still dying. The United States is trying to teach Iraqis how to run their own country. This will take a long time. 

The government made it seem like the war would be easy. This was not true. Democracy takes a long time to build. It was a long struggle in the United States.  It is not easy to change a country's government.

The United States is in a difficult position. We cannot just leave Iraq now. We started the war, and we have a responsibility to help. But how much longer can we stay? How many more soldiers will die? Is it worth the cost?

We should think carefully about why we are in Iraq. We say we are there to make it a democracy. But why not help other countries too?

The government said Iraq had weapons of mass destruction. But they were never found. We know North Korea has weapons of mass destruction, but we are not attacking them.  

I hope the war in Iraq will end soon. I hope there will be peace.

I support gay marriage. I have always supported it. I think it is a personal choice. Some people say it is a choice, but I think it is how a person is born. People should not lose rights because of who they love. I think it is not fair. 

I think the government should not tell people who they can love. It is a personal matter. In my neighborhood, there are gay couples who live like any other family. They walk their dogs and go to the store. 

I think it is wrong for the government to say what marriage is. 

I have read that some people are born gay. It may be in their genes. It is not a choice.

It is different for gay people. If a man and a woman want to marry, they can do it quietly. If two gay people want to marry, it is a big news story.  I think marriage should be private. It should not be the government's business.

The internet is for all people.  When you put things on the internet, everyone can see it. 

It is important to think before you post.  If you talk about bad things, people will notice.   The school may see your posts.

A person may see a post and tell the school. The school must act if there is danger.

Sometimes people joke on the internet. It is hard to know if something is a joke or serious.

One time, someone made a joke on the internet. The school saw the joke and got worried. They talked to the person.

The person said the joke was not serious.  But the school had to check.

If you do not want people to see something, do not post it.

The school should not look at your internet posts. It is a privacy issue.

But if someone tells the school about something bad, they must look into it.

The war has gone on for too long. At first, the goal was good.  People wanted to help another country get democracy. But now, I think we are in the war for other reasons. Maybe we want to show that we are strong.

Maybe the reasons for the war were not good from the start. There were problems between George Bush’s father and Saddam Hussein. If we wanted to help people have fair elections, that would be a good reason. But if there were personal reasons, that would not be fair.

We showed our strength in the first few months. We did not need to fight for so long. The war should have ended after a few months.

If we wanted to help people who were not free, that would be a good reason. But now, I think our reasons are not clear. It seems like we are fighting to fight, not to help. We need to end the war and win.

The war is costing a lot of money. We are spending money on a war that is not good. We should spend money on problems in our own country, like poverty. We need to take care of our people.

We can spend money on schools, roads, and hospitals. We need to help our own people. We should not spend money on a war that is not important.

Our soldiers are dying in a war that does not have a good purpose. It is time to end the war.

Can I ask a question? My friend told me that someone saw bad things on Myspace. This person stopped a bad thing from happening. I think it is good that somebody saw this.  But what if someone looks at a person's Myspace without permission? Is this fair?

On Myspace, you can only see a person's profile if they are your friend. But if you are friends, you can see their profile.  

I think when you put things on the internet, many people can see them. So, it is hard to keep things private. It is not fair to look at peoples Myspace without permission.

But what if someone is planning to do something bad? Should someone look at their Myspace? I do not know.

Facebook is like Myspace. I am worried that bad people can see things about me. I saw a news story about a man who found a girl's name on Facebook. He talked to her and made her meet him. I would never meet someone I do not know. 

Some people in my classes talk to me on Facebook even though I do not know them. They know my name and things about me. It is hard to know who is looking at my profile. I try to be careful about what I put on Facebook.

My roommate said her high school did not allow students to use Myspace. I think it is strange that the school can tell students what they can and cannot do on the internet.

The Iraq War was a bad idea. Many people think so. Polls show that most people in Iraq, the United States, and the world think the war was wrong.  Most U.S. soldiers in Iraq also think we should leave.

The war has been a problem since it began. Leaving will also be hard.

The United States and Middle Eastern countries are very different. Our ideas about how to live are different. The government tried to bring democracy to Iraq. This did not work.

Saddam Hussein was a bad leader. But invading Iraq was a mistake. The war has made things worse.

It is time for the United States to leave Iraq.  The Iraqi people want us to leave. The war has lasted a long time. We should go home.

Yes, I think man and woman have different problems in the U.S. It is not just women. 

Women face a special kind of problem. Even though there should be equality, it is hard to find men who will work under a woman boss. This is because society has been this way for a long time. 

Sometimes women are good at a job. They have the skills. But the company will not give them a promotion because they are women. People think women do not belong in important jobs.

Men face problems too. For example, it is rare to see a man stay home with children. People think men should work and make money.

In the fashion world, men are sometimes not taken seriously. People think fashion is for women. 

So, in many jobs, there is discrimination. It is hard to change because people have strong ideas. We have made progress, but change is slow.  

Women are becoming CEOs and people are accepting this. Stay-at-home dads are more common. People are starting to understand that men can be good parents.

We need to show the good qualities of people who are different. We must not be pushy. If we force change, people will resist.

Change takes time.

They did not legalize it. They made it not a crime. This means it is not a big crime like stealing. It is more like a ticket for speeding.  If you get caught, you just get a ticket. You do not go to jail. 

Some people worry about the future. They worry that having a ticket will hurt them. For example, it might make it hard to get a job. 

It costs a lot to arrest people. It costs money to put them in jail and to take them to court.  

Some places do not have much money. They do not want to spend money on arresting people for marijuana. 

Denver has more money. People in Denver like marijuana.  They think it is okay. Denver can use the money to help schools and people who need help.

Marijuana should not be everywhere. It is not good for everyone. But it is good to save money.

If marijuana were legal, it might be sold in stores like cigarettes. People might smoke it everywhere. This might be bad.

Alcohol is bad for you. Marijuana is bad for you too. But they are different. Some people react differently to each drug. Some people can use drugs without problems. Some people cannot.

I say yes.

Many things they do are old. They do the same things for a long time. It is good to follow tradition. But it is also good to change.

Many Catholics go to church every week. They are strict about how things are done. Sometimes I feel the church looks down on people who do not follow the rules. They do not accept people who are not perfect Catholics. They also do not accept people of other religions.

My dad was not Catholic. My mom was Catholic. They could not marry in the Catholic church. This is not accepting of other religions. We learned to love others. This is a Catholic teaching. 

It is wrong to say to love others and not accept them. I feel that the church tells you to do things. But the church’s actions are different. The church is old. They stick with old ways.

I do not think this would change things. I think it would be good if priests could marry. But this would not stop bad priests. It is a different problem.

Bad priests hurt children. They would probably hurt children even if they were married.  A spouse is different from a child.

I do not think allowing priests to marry would stop bad things from happening.

I am not sure about this issue. I can not say if one side is right or wrong. But I think this is a hard problem. 

It is hard to talk about the church and state. It is also hard to say what marriage is. We must not offend anyone.

I think all unions should be the same. I do not know if marriage should be defined by the government.  The government does not give tax breaks to people who are baptized. 

If people are married, the government should see it as a civil union.  It is two people. The government should not care what kind of marriage it is.

Gay marriage is a civil union. Two people are together.

If all states agree, they should make it a law for the whole country. but a law to ban gay marriage is not good. The constitution should not be changed for this.

This is important to some people, but not enough to change the constitution. It is not important enough to ban gay marriage.

I grew up in a Christian home. Homosexuality is a difficult topic for me. I have many gay friends. I do not agree with this way of life, but I think it should be legal. It should not be a big issue for the whole country. Each state should decide.

Some states are Democrat. Many states are Republican. Democrat states want gay marriage. If you live in a Democrat state, you know how they feel. I do not think you should disagree with their choice. You chose to live there.

I think gay people should have the same rights as straight people. I think it should be legal, but each state should decide.

I think the president should not decide this for the whole country. Each state should decide for itself. I do not agree with the president's ban.

I do not think the president lives in every state. He should not decide how each state runs itself. Some things should be up to each state. The president will leave office soon. A Democrat president may change the law.

It should be up to each state. They will have to live with the decision. Not the president.

Myspace is like a public board. If you put something on it, others can see it. School officials can see it too. 

If someone posts something bad on Myspace, the school can see it even if they are not using the school computer. The school wants to keep students safe. If they see something that could stop a bad event, they can act.  

It is like when the school does drills for emergencies. They do this to keep everyone safe.

Students should be careful what they post online. Anything online can be seen by others, even if they do not want it to be seen. 

The school has a duty to keep students safe.

I was for the war at first. Nine Eleven affected me. I wanted to fight back. I think we went to war too quickly. We did not have a good plan. I think the war was a mistake.  

The people there fight with each other.  If they cannot get along, they cannot fight us. I do not care about what happens there now.  I do not think they are human. They fight each other.  

We went to war without knowing what to expect. War is different there. They are savage. I think they want us to leave. We should leave.

I think we were angry. We did not think about the results. We wanted revenge. President Bush wanted to go to war. The people wanted it too. They attacked us, so we had to fight back.  

We did not have a good plan. We did not know what to do. There was no unity. We should have had a better plan.  

We cannot change them. They will always be like this. I do not think we are making enough progress. We should leave.

The Catholic Church must change some of its views. Many people are leaving the Church. The Church is not accepting of many things.

For example, the Church is against gay marriage, abortion, and birth control. These are important issues. The Church's views are old. The Church should be more modern.

People disagree with the Church on these issues. They think the Church is wrong.  People who support abortion or gay marriage may not feel welcome in the Church.  

The Church does not allow female priests. It also says priests must not marry.  

Why can't priests marry? They have a job, and everyone else has a family. Priests should be able to have both.

I support gay marriage. I think people are born this way.  It is not a choice. Gay people should not be punished for who they are.  A man and a woman can marry. Two people of the same sex should be able to marry too.

I do not think the government should be involved. It is a personal choice. It is not a crime. It is not a moral issue. The government should not tell people who they can marry. 

It is wrong to say gay people made a wrong choice.

Gay marriage is good. There is not a good reason to say no. Some people think gay couples are bad for families. But gay couples are different. They are like two sides of the same thing.

Gay couples have the same rights as straight couples. They should have the same rights for health care and taxes.

If a gay couple is sick, their partner cannot be in the room. This is wrong.

Science shows that gay couples are happy. They have the same things that make a relationship strong. 

Gay couples want a marriage certificate, not a church wedding. The government should give them this.

Some people say that gay marriage is wrong because of religion. But the government should not make laws based on religion.

Gay marriage is like segregation. It is not fair.

Some people worry about gay couples having children. They think children of gay couples will have problems. But gay couples can be good parents.

Gay people should not be treated badly. The government should make gay marriage legal in all states.

I work in a hospital pharmacy. I see drugs every day. Some drugs are bad. But some drugs help people.  

Some drugs are against the law. But that does not mean they are bad. Some drugs are good for people.

For example, we use some strong drugs in the pharmacy. These drugs are against the law. But they help people feel better.  

Marijuana is against the law. But it can help people.  We should look at the good things about marijuana.  

Alcohol is bad if you use too much. Marijuana can also be bad if you use too much. But we should not say marijuana is bad because it is against the law.

We should learn about marijuana. We should talk about it openly. 

Marijuana is not as bad as other drugs.  We should not think of marijuana as a bad thing.

The church is different now than it was many years ago. It is not as strict. When I was young, I went to church every Sunday. I wore a dress, shoes, and a purse. I went to a private school and saw my friends there every weekend. Now, the church has a special service for teenagers. It is thirty minutes long. People dress more casually. In the summer, people come in beach clothes. Families often arrive late. Even at morning services, people wear jeans and khakis.

People say that letting women be priests would stop bad things from happening. But bad things happen even to married men. I think it is a person's choice to become a priest. There are other religions where priests can be married. If someone wants to be married and religious, they should choose a different religion.

I think some people are born with bad thoughts. It is like their genes. Marriage does not change this. It might be hard to hide, but it might happen anyway. The church cannot stop this from happening. If the church knew about these bad things and covered them up, that is wrong. But I do not think they always knew.

I did not like the idea of war in Iraq. Many people felt the same way after the September 11th attacks. The Bush administration said the war was about stopping Osama Bin Laden and stopping Saddam Hussein from hurting America. They said Hussein had weapons of mass destruction. This is not true. It made me angry. 

The Bush administration did not tell the truth to the people. Colin Powell, who spoke at the United Nations, now says he was not sure about the evidence. This is wrong. It is bad for a leader to lie to the people. I think it is a serious problem.

The Bush administration did not respect the Constitution. They wanted to go to war. The Secretary of the Treasury said this in a book. He left his job. I think President Bush wanted to fight Saddam Hussein because his father had trouble with him. I also think he wanted more oil.

The war has gone on for a long time. It is hard to leave now because Iraq might have a civil war. More people would die. 

The United Nations and the United States want other countries to help. They want to help make peace. But this might cause more problems. Iraq needs to be in control of its own country. 

The Iraqi government is not working well. The Parliament is not strong. The Prime Minister does not have much power. There are many groups fighting for control. The situation is very difficult.

I talk about the war in Iraq. 

I think it is bad. 

We went to war in Iraq after the bad men hurt America on nine eleven.  

But now I think it is not good.

We stay in Iraq to help them. We want them to have good government like America.

But it is hard. We stay in Iraq for a long time.

It is bad for the people in Iraq.

It is bad for America.

I do not know what to do.

I do not think it is right to make this act legal. I do not think a state should say it is legal. I think it is up to the churches. The constitution says there should be a separation of church and state. This is clear.  Trying to make a law about this would go against the constitution.

People who want to make this act illegal are choosing one church's beliefs over others. Many Catholics and Christians are against this. I do not think the government should say what churches can and cannot do.

Separation of church and state is important for religious freedom in the United States. Making a new law about this would be wrong. It would go against the constitution. It would also be one of the few laws that restrict people, not the government. I do not think this is right.

I do not think the government should be involved in this issue. The person pushing for a new law is doing this because he does not agree with this act. He is choosing his religion over others. I think it is up to the churches to decide. The government should not tell them what to do. There is no good reason to make a new law.

The war in Iraq is bad. The government did not tell the people the true reasons for the war. They tried to say the war was needed after the attacks on September 11th. But these two things were not connected. The government used the people's fear to start the war in 2003. 

I am against war, especially starting a war before it is needed. The war in Iraq is like the war in Vietnam. The government should have learned from past mistakes. Many American soldiers died. The government took over Iraq's government. They did not plan for what would happen after. The government did not plan for the problems and chaos that followed.

The United States is trying to make Iraq a democracy. This is like what they tried to do in Vietnam. They wanted to stop Communism.  But the government should have known that it would be very hard. It would not be a quick victory. 

In Vietnam, there were many people who did not want the United States there. It is hard to fight a war against your own people. You cannot win this kind of war. 

The government should have been more honest and ready for the war. They did not plan for what would happen after they removed the Iraqi government. We are still there today, and many American soldiers are still dying. The United States is trying to teach Iraqis how to run their own country. This will take a long time. 

The government made it seem like the war would be easy. This was not true. Democracy takes a long time to build. It was a long struggle in the United States.  It is not easy to change a country's government.

The United States is in a difficult position. We cannot just leave Iraq now. We started the war, and we have a responsibility to help. But how much longer can we stay? How many more soldiers will die? Is it worth the cost?

We should think carefully about why we are in Iraq. We say we are there to make it a democracy. But why not help other countries too?

The government said Iraq had weapons of mass destruction. But they were never found. We know North Korea has weapons of mass destruction, but we are not attacking them.  

I hope the war in Iraq will end soon. I hope there will be peace.

I support gay marriage. I have always supported it. I think it is a personal choice. Some people say it is a choice, but I think it is how a person is born. People should not lose rights because of who they love. I think it is not fair. 

I think the government should not tell people who they can love. It is a personal matter. In my neighborhood, there are gay couples who live like any other family. They walk their dogs and go to the store. 

I think it is wrong for the government to say what marriage is. 

I have read that some people are born gay. It may be in their genes. It is not a choice.

It is different for gay people. If a man and a woman want to marry, they can do it quietly. If two gay people want to marry, it is a big news story.  I think marriage should be private. It should not be the government's business.

The internet is for all people.  When you put things on the internet, everyone can see it. 

It is important to think before you post.  If you talk about bad things, people will notice.   The school may see your posts.

A person may see a post and tell the school. The school must act if there is danger.

Sometimes people joke on the internet. It is hard to know if something is a joke or serious.

One time, someone made a joke on the internet. The school saw the joke and got worried. They talked to the person.

The person said the joke was not serious.  But the school had to check.

If you do not want people to see something, do not post it.

The school should not look at your internet posts. It is a privacy issue.

But if someone tells the school about something bad, they must look into it.

The war has gone on for too long. At first, the goal was good.  People wanted to help another country get democracy. But now, I think we are in the war for other reasons. Maybe we want to show that we are strong.

Maybe the reasons for the war were not good from the start. There were problems between George Bush’s father and Saddam Hussein. If we wanted to help people have fair elections, that would be a good reason. But if there were personal reasons, that would not be fair.

We showed our strength in the first few months. We did not need to fight for so long. The war should have ended after a few months.

If we wanted to help people who were not free, that would be a good reason. But now, I think our reasons are not clear. It seems like we are fighting to fight, not to help. We need to end the war and win.

The war is costing a lot of money. We are spending money on a war that is not good. We should spend money on problems in our own country, like poverty. We need to take care of our people.

We can spend money on schools, roads, and hospitals. We need to help our own people. We should not spend money on a war that is not important.

Our soldiers are dying in a war that does not have a good purpose. It is time to end the war.

Can I ask a question? My friend told me that someone saw bad things on Myspace. This person stopped a bad thing from happening. I think it is good that somebody saw this.  But what if someone looks at a person's Myspace without permission? Is this fair?

On Myspace, you can only see a person's profile if they are your friend. But if you are friends, you can see their profile.  

I think when you put things on the internet, many people can see them. So, it is hard to keep things private. It is not fair to look at peoples Myspace without permission.

But what if someone is planning to do something bad? Should someone look at their Myspace? I do not know.

Facebook is like Myspace. I am worried that bad people can see things about me. I saw a news story about a man who found a girl's name on Facebook. He talked to her and made her meet him. I would never meet someone I do not know. 

Some people in my classes talk to me on Facebook even though I do not know them. They know my name and things about me. It is hard to know who is looking at my profile. I try to be careful about what I put on Facebook.

My roommate said her high school did not allow students to use Myspace. I think it is strange that the school can tell students what they can and cannot do on the internet.

The Iraq War was a bad idea. Many people think so. Polls show that most people in Iraq, the United States, and the world think the war was wrong.  Most U.S. soldiers in Iraq also think we should leave.

The war has been a problem since it began. Leaving will also be hard.

The United States and Middle Eastern countries are very different. Our ideas about how to live are different. The government tried to bring democracy to Iraq. This did not work.

Saddam Hussein was a bad leader. But invading Iraq was a mistake. The war has made things worse.

It is time for the United States to leave Iraq.  The Iraqi people want us to leave. The war has lasted a long time. We should go home.

Yes, I think man and woman have different problems in the U.S. It is not just women. 

Women face a special kind of problem. Even though there should be equality, it is hard to find men who will work under a woman boss. This is because society has been this way for a long time. 

Sometimes women are good at a job. They have the skills. But the company will not give them a promotion because they are women. People think women do not belong in important jobs.

Men face problems too. For example, it is rare to see a man stay home with children. People think men should work and make money.

In the fashion world, men are sometimes not taken seriously. People think fashion is for women. 

So, in many jobs, there is discrimination. It is hard to change because people have strong ideas. We have made progress, but change is slow.  

Women are becoming CEOs and people are accepting this. Stay-at-home dads are more common. People are starting to understand that men can be good parents.

We need to show the good qualities of people who are different. We must not be pushy. If we force change, people will resist.

Change takes time.

They did not legalize it. They made it not a crime. This means it is not a big crime like stealing. It is more like a ticket for speeding.  If you get caught, you just get a ticket. You do not go to jail. 

Some people worry about the future. They worry that having a ticket will hurt them. For example, it might make it hard to get a job. 

It costs a lot to arrest people. It costs money to put them in jail and to take them to court.  

Some places do not have much money. They do not want to spend money on arresting people for marijuana. 

Denver has more money. People in Denver like marijuana.  They think it is okay. Denver can use the money to help schools and people who need help.

Marijuana should not be everywhere. It is not good for everyone. But it is good to save money.

If marijuana were legal, it might be sold in stores like cigarettes. People might smoke it everywhere. This might be bad.

Alcohol is bad for you. Marijuana is bad for you too. But they are different. Some people react differently to each drug. Some people can use drugs without problems. Some people cannot.

I say yes.

Many things they do are old. They do the same things for a long time. It is good to follow tradition. But it is also good to change.

Many Catholics go to church every week. They are strict about how things are done. Sometimes I feel the church looks down on people who do not follow the rules. They do not accept people who are not perfect Catholics. They also do not accept people of other religions.

My dad was not Catholic. My mom was Catholic. They could not marry in the Catholic church. This is not accepting of other religions. We learned to love others. This is a Catholic teaching. 

It is wrong to say to love others and not accept them. I feel that the church tells you to do things. But the church’s actions are different. The church is old. They stick with old ways.

I do not think this would change things. I think it would be good if priests could marry. But this would not stop bad priests. It is a different problem.

Bad priests hurt children. They would probably hurt children even if they were married.  A spouse is different from a child.

I do not think allowing priests to marry would stop bad things from happening.

I am not sure about this issue. I can not say if one side is right or wrong. But I think this is a hard problem. 

It is hard to talk about the church and state. It is also hard to say what marriage is. We must not offend anyone.

I think all unions should be the same. I do not know if marriage should be defined by the government.  The government does not give tax breaks to people who are baptized. 

If people are married, the government should see it as a civil union.  It is two people. The government should not care what kind of marriage it is.

Gay marriage is a civil union. Two people are together.

If all states agree, they should make it a law for the whole country. but a law to ban gay marriage is not good. The constitution should not be changed for this.

This is important to some people, but not enough to change the constitution. It is not important enough to ban gay marriage.

I grew up in a Christian home. Homosexuality is a difficult topic for me. I have many gay friends. I do not agree with this way of life, but I think it should be legal. It should not be a big issue for the whole country. Each state should decide.

Some states are Democrat. Many states are Republican. Democrat states want gay marriage. If you live in a Democrat state, you know how they feel. I do not think you should disagree with their choice. You chose to live there.

I think gay people should have the same rights as straight people. I think it should be legal, but each state should decide.

I think the president should not decide this for the whole country. Each state should decide for itself. I do not agree with the president's ban.

I do not think the president lives in every state. He should not decide how each state runs itself. Some things should be up to each state. The president will leave office soon. A Democrat president may change the law.

It should be up to each state. They will have to live with the decision. Not the president.

Myspace is like a public board. If you put something on it, others can see it. School officials can see it too. 

If someone posts something bad on Myspace, the school can see it even if they are not using the school computer. The school wants to keep students safe. If they see something that could stop a bad event, they can act.  

It is like when the school does drills for emergencies. They do this to keep everyone safe.

Students should be careful what they post online. Anything online can be seen by others, even if they do not want it to be seen. 

The school has a duty to keep students safe.

I was for the war at first. Nine Eleven affected me. I wanted to fight back. I think we went to war too quickly. We did not have a good plan. I think the war was a mistake.  

The people there fight with each other.  If they cannot get along, they cannot fight us. I do not care about what happens there now.  I do not think they are human. They fight each other.  

We went to war without knowing what to expect. War is different there. They are savage. I think they want us to leave. We should leave.

I think we were angry. We did not think about the results. We wanted revenge. President Bush wanted to go to war. The people wanted it too. They attacked us, so we had to fight back.  

We did not have a good plan. We did not know what to do. There was no unity. We should have had a better plan.  

We cannot change them. They will always be like this. I do not think we are making enough progress. We should leave.

The Catholic Church must change some of its views. Many people are leaving the Church. The Church is not accepting of many things.

For example, the Church is against gay marriage, abortion, and birth control. These are important issues. The Church's views are old. The Church should be more modern.

People disagree with the Church on these issues. They think the Church is wrong.  People who support abortion or gay marriage may not feel welcome in the Church.  

The Church does not allow female priests. It also says priests must not marry.  

Why can't priests marry? They have a job, and everyone else has a family. Priests should be able to have both.

I support gay marriage. I think people are born this way.  It is not a choice. Gay people should not be punished for who they are.  A man and a woman can marry. Two people of the same sex should be able to marry too.

I do not think the government should be involved. It is a personal choice. It is not a crime. It is not a moral issue. The government should not tell people who they can marry. 

It is wrong to say gay people made a wrong choice.

Gay marriage is good. There is not a good reason to say no. Some people think gay couples are bad for families. But gay couples are different. They are like two sides of the same thing.

Gay couples have the same rights as straight couples. They should have the same rights for health care and taxes.

If a gay couple is sick, their partner cannot be in the room. This is wrong.

Science shows that gay couples are happy. They have the same things that make a relationship strong. 

Gay couples want a marriage certificate, not a church wedding. The government should give them this.

Some people say that gay marriage is wrong because of religion. But the government should not make laws based on religion.

Gay marriage is like segregation. It is not fair.

Some people worry about gay couples having children. They think children of gay couples will have problems. But gay couples can be good parents.

Gay people should not be treated badly. The government should make gay marriage legal in all states.

I work in a hospital pharmacy. I see drugs every day. Some drugs are bad. But some drugs help people.  

Some drugs are against the law. But that does not mean they are bad. Some drugs are good for people.

For example, we use some strong drugs in the pharmacy. These drugs are against the law. But they help people feel better.  

Marijuana is against the law. But it can help people.  We should look at the good things about marijuana.  

Alcohol is bad if you use too much. Marijuana can also be bad if you use too much. But we should not say marijuana is bad because it is against the law.

We should learn about marijuana. We should talk about it openly. 

Marijuana is not as bad as other drugs.  We should not think of marijuana as a bad thing.

The church is different now than it was many years ago. It is not as strict. When I was young, I went to church every Sunday. I wore a dress, shoes, and a purse. I went to a private school and saw my friends there every weekend. Now, the church has a special service for teenagers. It is thirty minutes long. People dress more casually. In the summer, people come in beach clothes. Families often arrive late. Even at morning services, people wear jeans and khakis.

People say that letting women be priests would stop bad things from happening. But bad things happen even to married men. I think it is a person's choice to become a priest. There are other religions where priests can be married. If someone wants to be married and religious, they should choose a different religion.

I think some people are born with bad thoughts. It is like their genes. Marriage does not change this. It might be hard to hide, but it might happen anyway. The church cannot stop this from happening. If the church knew about these bad things and covered them up, that is wrong. But I do not think they always knew.

I did not like the idea of war in Iraq. Many people felt the same way after the September 11th attacks. The Bush administration said the war was about stopping Osama Bin Laden and stopping Saddam Hussein from hurting America. They said Hussein had weapons of mass destruction. This is not true. It made me angry. 

The Bush administration did not tell the truth to the people. Colin Powell, who spoke at the United Nations, now says he was not sure about the evidence. This is wrong. It is bad for a leader to lie to the people. I think it is a serious problem.

The Bush administration did not respect the Constitution. They wanted to go to war. The Secretary of the Treasury said this in a book. He left his job. I think President Bush wanted to fight Saddam Hussein because his father had trouble with him. I also think he wanted more oil.

The war has gone on for a long time. It is hard to leave now because Iraq might have a civil war. More people would die. 

The United Nations and the United States want other countries to help. They want to help make peace. But this might cause more problems. Iraq needs to be in control of its own country. 

The Iraqi government is not working well. The Parliament is not strong. The Prime Minister does not have much power. There are many groups fighting for control. The situation is very difficult.

I talk about the war in Iraq. 

I think it is bad. 

We went to war in Iraq after the bad men hurt America on nine eleven.  

But now I think it is not good.

We stay in Iraq to help them. We want them to have good government like America.

But it is hard. We stay in Iraq for a long time.

It is bad for the people in Iraq.

It is bad for America.

I do not know what to do.

I do not think it is right to make this act legal. I do not think a state should say it is legal. I think it is up to the churches. The constitution says there should be a separation of church and state. This is clear.  Trying to make a law about this would go against the constitution.

People who want to make this act illegal are choosing one church's beliefs over others. Many Catholics and Christians are against this. I do not think the government should say what churches can and cannot do.

Separation of church and state is important for religious freedom in the United States. Making a new law about this would be wrong. It would go against the constitution. It would also be one of the few laws that restrict people, not the government. I do not think this is right.

I do not think the government should be involved in this issue. The person pushing for a new law is doing this because he does not agree with this act. He is choosing his religion over others. I think it is up to the churches to decide. The government should not tell them what to do. There is no good reason to make a new law.

The war in Iraq is bad. The government did not tell the people the true reasons for the war. They tried to say the war was needed after the attacks on September 11th. But these two things were not connected. The government used the people's fear to start the war in 2003. 

I am against war, especially starting a war before it is needed. The war in Iraq is like the war in Vietnam. The government should have learned from past mistakes. Many American soldiers died. The government took over Iraq's government. They did not plan for what would happen after. The government did not plan for the problems and chaos that followed.

The United States is trying to make Iraq a democracy. This is like what they tried to do in Vietnam. They wanted to stop Communism.  But the government should have known that it would be very hard. It would not be a quick victory. 

In Vietnam, there were many people who did not want the United States there. It is hard to fight a war against your own people. You cannot win this kind of war. 

The government should have been more honest and ready for the war. They did not plan for what would happen after they removed the Iraqi government. We are still there today, and many American soldiers are still dying. The United States is trying to teach Iraqis how to run their own country. This will take a long time. 

The government made it seem like the war would be easy. This was not true. Democracy takes a long time to build. It was a long struggle in the United States.  It is not easy to change a country's government.

The United States is in a difficult position. We cannot just leave Iraq now. We started the war, and we have a responsibility to help. But how much longer can we stay? How many more soldiers will die? Is it worth the cost?

We should think carefully about why we are in Iraq. We say we are there to make it a democracy. But why not help other countries too?

The government said Iraq had weapons of mass destruction. But they were never found. We know North Korea has weapons of mass destruction, but we are not attacking them.  

I hope the war in Iraq will end soon. I hope there will be peace.

I support gay marriage. I have always supported it. I think it is a personal choice. Some people say it is a choice, but I think it is how a person is born. People should not lose rights because of who they love. I think it is not fair. 

I think the government should not tell people who they can love. It is a personal matter. In my neighborhood, there are gay couples who live like any other family. They walk their dogs and go to the store. 

I think it is wrong for the government to say what marriage is. 

I have read that some people are born gay. It may be in their genes. It is not a choice.

It is different for gay people. If a man and a woman want to marry, they can do it quietly. If two gay people want to marry, it is a big news story.  I think marriage should be private. It should not be the government's business.

The internet is for all people.  When you put things on the internet, everyone can see it. 

It is important to think before you post.  If you talk about bad things, people will notice.   The school may see your posts.

A person may see a post and tell the school. The school must act if there is danger.

Sometimes people joke on the internet. It is hard to know if something is a joke or serious.

One time, someone made a joke on the internet. The school saw the joke and got worried. They talked to the person.

The person said the joke was not serious.  But the school had to check.

If you do not want people to see something, do not post it.

The school should not look at your internet posts. It is a privacy issue.

But if someone tells the school about something bad, they must look into it.

The war has gone on for too long. At first, the goal was good.  People wanted to help another country get democracy. But now, I think we are in the war for other reasons. Maybe we want to show that we are strong.

Maybe the reasons for the war were not good from the start. There were problems between George Bush’s father and Saddam Hussein. If we wanted to help people have fair elections, that would be a good reason. But if there were personal reasons, that would not be fair.

We showed our strength in the first few months. We did not need to fight for so long. The war should have ended after a few months.

If we wanted to help people who were not free, that would be a good reason. But now, I think our reasons are not clear. It seems like we are fighting to fight, not to help. We need to end the war and win.

The war is costing a lot of money. We are spending money on a war that is not good. We should spend money on problems in our own country, like poverty. We need to take care of our people.

We can spend money on schools, roads, and hospitals. We need to help our own people. We should not spend money on a war that is not important.

Our soldiers are dying in a war that does not have a good purpose. It is time to end the war.

Can I ask a question? My friend told me that someone saw bad things on Myspace. This person stopped a bad thing from happening. I think it is good that somebody saw this.  But what if someone looks at a person's Myspace without permission? Is this fair?

On Myspace, you can only see a person's profile if they are your friend. But if you are friends, you can see their profile.  

I think when you put things on the internet, many people can see them. So, it is hard to keep things private. It is not fair to look at peoples Myspace without permission.

But what if someone is planning to do something bad? Should someone look at their Myspace? I do not know.

Facebook is like Myspace. I am worried that bad people can see things about me. I saw a news story about a man who found a girl's name on Facebook. He talked to her and made her meet him. I would never meet someone I do not know. 

Some people in my classes talk to me on Facebook even though I do not know them. They know my name and things about me. It is hard to know who is looking at my profile. I try to be careful about what I put on Facebook.

My roommate said her high school did not allow students to use Myspace. I think it is strange that the school can tell students what they can and cannot do on the internet.

The Iraq War was a bad idea. Many people think so. Polls show that most people in Iraq, the United States, and the world think the war was wrong.  Most U.S. soldiers in Iraq also think we should leave.

The war has been a problem since it began. Leaving will also be hard.

The United States and Middle Eastern countries are very different. Our ideas about how to live are different. The government tried to bring democracy to Iraq. This did not work.

Saddam Hussein was a bad leader. But invading Iraq was a mistake. The war has made things worse.

It is time for the United States to leave Iraq.  The Iraqi people want us to leave. The war has lasted a long time. We should go home.

Yes, I think man and woman have different problems in the U.S. It is not just women. 

Women face a special kind of problem. Even though there should be equality, it is hard to find men who will work under a woman boss. This is because society has been this way for a long time. 

Sometimes women are good at a job. They have the skills. But the company will not give them a promotion because they are women. People think women do not belong in important jobs.

Men face problems too. For example, it is rare to see a man stay home with children. People think men should work and make money.

In the fashion world, men are sometimes not taken seriously. People think fashion is for women. 

So, in many jobs, there is discrimination. It is hard to change because people have strong ideas. We have made progress, but change is slow.  

Women are becoming CEOs and people are accepting this. Stay-at-home dads are more common. People are starting to understand that men can be good parents.

We need to show the good qualities of people who are different. We must not be pushy. If we force change, people will resist.

Change takes time.

They did not legalize it. They made it not a crime. This means it is not a big crime like stealing. It is more like a ticket for speeding.  If you get caught, you just get a ticket. You do not go to jail. 

Some people worry about the future. They worry that having a ticket will hurt them. For example, it might make it hard to get a job. 

It costs a lot to arrest people. It costs money to put them in jail and to take them to court.  

Some places do not have much money. They do not want to spend money on arresting people for marijuana. 

Denver has more money. People in Denver like marijuana.  They think it is okay. Denver can use the money to help schools and people who need help.

Marijuana should not be everywhere. It is not good for everyone. But it is good to save money.

If marijuana were legal, it might be sold in stores like cigarettes. People might smoke it everywhere. This might be bad.

Alcohol is bad for you. Marijuana is bad for you too. But they are different. Some people react differently to each drug. Some people can use drugs without problems. Some people cannot.

I say yes.

Many things they do are old. They do the same things for a long time. It is good to follow tradition. But it is also good to change.

Many Catholics go to church every week. They are strict about how things are done. Sometimes I feel the church looks down on people who do not follow the rules. They do not accept people who are not perfect Catholics. They also do not accept people of other religions.

My dad was not Catholic. My mom was Catholic. They could not marry in the Catholic church. This is not accepting of other religions. We learned to love others. This is a Catholic teaching. 

It is wrong to say to love others and not accept them. I feel that the church tells you to do things. But the church’s actions are different. The church is old. They stick with old ways.

I do not think this would change things. I think it would be good if priests could marry. But this would not stop bad priests. It is a different problem.

Bad priests hurt children. They would probably hurt children even if they were married.  A spouse is different from a child.

I do not think allowing priests to marry would stop bad things from happening.

I am not sure about this issue. I can not say if one side is right or wrong. But I think this is a hard problem. 

It is hard to talk about the church and state. It is also hard to say what marriage is. We must not offend anyone.

I think all unions should be the same. I do not know if marriage should be defined by the government.  The government does not give tax breaks to people who are baptized. 

If people are married, the government should see it as a civil union.  It is two people. The government should not care what kind of marriage it is.

Gay marriage is a civil union. Two people are together.

If all states agree, they should make it a law for the whole country. but a law to ban gay marriage is not good. The constitution should not be changed for this.

This is important to some people, but not enough to change the constitution. It is not important enough to ban gay marriage.

I grew up in a Christian home. Homosexuality is a difficult topic for me. I have many gay friends. I do not agree with this way of life, but I think it should be legal. It should not be a big issue for the whole country. Each state should decide.

Some states are Democrat. Many states are Republican. Democrat states want gay marriage. If you live in a Democrat state, you know how they feel. I do not think you should disagree with their choice. You chose to live there.

I think gay people should have the same rights as straight people. I think it should be legal, but each state should decide.

I think the president should not decide this for the whole country. Each state should decide for itself. I do not agree with the president's ban.

I do not think the president lives in every state. He should not decide how each state runs itself. Some things should be up to each state. The president will leave office soon. A Democrat president may change the law.

It should be up to each state. They will have to live with the decision. Not the president.

Myspace is like a public board. If you put something on it, others can see it. School officials can see it too. 

If someone posts something bad on Myspace, the school can see it even if they are not using the school computer. The school wants to keep students safe. If they see something that could stop a bad event, they can act.  

It is like when the school does drills for emergencies. They do this to keep everyone safe.

Students should be careful what they post online. Anything online can be seen by others, even if they do not want it to be seen. 

The school has a duty to keep students safe.

I was for the war at first. Nine Eleven affected me. I wanted to fight back. I think we went to war too quickly. We did not have a good plan. I think the war was a mistake.  

The people there fight with each other.  If they cannot get along, they cannot fight us. I do not care about what happens there now.  I do not think they are human. They fight each other.  

We went to war without knowing what to expect. War is different there. They are savage. I think they want us to leave. We should leave.

I think we were angry. We did not think about the results. We wanted revenge. President Bush wanted to go to war. The people wanted it too. They attacked us, so we had to fight back.  

We did not have a good plan. We did not know what to do. There was no unity. We should have had a better plan.  

We cannot change them. They will always be like this. I do not think we are making enough progress. We should leave.
